import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import FormContainer from "../components/FormContainer"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; import Message from "../components/Message"; function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const placeOrder = () => { console.log("YER"); }; return (

Shipping

{cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, ,{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

{cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} ={" "} {(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Item: ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax: ${cart.taxPrice} Total: ${cart.totalPrice}
); } export default PlaceOrderScreen;
